original_text: The third day after my child was born, this woman also had a baby. We were alone; there was no one in the house but the two of us.
korean_text: 내가 해산한 지 사흘 만에 이 여자도 해산하고 우리가 함께 있었고 우리 둘 외에는 집에 다른 사람이 없었나이다

sentences.original_text: The third day after my child was born
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아이가 태어난 지 사흘 만에

sentences.original_text: this woman also had a baby
there was no one in the house
